bugs.error_description: Omission fault (development phase, human-made, nonmalicious, software): missing userRepository.delete(existingUserEntity); user fetched but not deleted, causing persistent database state deviation (dormant error activates on delete requests)

Commission fault (development phase, human-made, nonmalicious, software): native SQL 'SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = \'' + username + '\'' vulnerable to SQL injection; external malicious input can alter query, leading to unauthorized access or data leak failures

Commission fault (development phase, human-made, nonmalicious, software): userRepository.findByUsername(username).get() throws NoSuchElementException on non-existent user instead of null/Unauthorized; deviates from secure login flow, causes erratic runtime failure

Omission fault (development phase, human-made, nonmalicious, software): missing addressRepository.save(addressEntity); address prepared but not persisted, causing database state omission error on create requests

Commission fault (development phase, human-made, nonmalicious, software): addressRepository.findById(addressId).get() assumes existence; throws unchecked exception instead of ResourceNotFoundException, inconsistent error handling

Omission fault (development phase, human-made, nonmalicious, interaction): missing @PreAuthorize on delete endpoint; permits any authenticated user to delete any user, violating authorization policy (high propagation to integrity failure)
Omission fault (development phase, human-made, nonmalicious, software): missing @Valid or @Validated on @RequestBody UserRequest in create; bypasses DTO validation, allows invalid data persistence

Design fault (development phase, human-made, nonmalicious, performance): userRepository.findAll() ignores Pageable, loads entire dataset into memory; risks out-of-memory errors for large user bases (latent under high load)

Commission fault (development phase, human-made, nonmalicious, software): @PostMapping(consumes = "text/plain") incompatible with @RequestBody AddressRequest (expects JSON); prevents proper request parsing, causes 400 errors on valid JSON
